articles.title: 'A completely different person': Employer laments maid's behaviour change, from bullying 6-year-old to hiding in room without food - AsiaOne
articles.description: When the employer, only known as Foo, first hired a maid two years ago, she was full of praise for the 26-year-old Myanmar national’s professionalism and work ethic. But it has all gone wrong. The 37-year-old said she hired the domestic worker in 2019 to look…
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Talk to rich people nicely, you're a poor girl': Two Singapore women fined for verbally abusing auxiliary police officer - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The victim was merely doing her job but had to suffer insults such as "talk to rich people nicely, you're a poor girl".
